modName: Hide Shield Re-textures - 2 versions - High Res
summary: This adds 2 re-textured versions of the Hide Shield. High-Res versions, resolution has been set at 2048x2048, up from original of 512x512.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ToQZ9EX.jpg[/IMG]

Two versions of a re-texture for the Hide Shield.
They are both high-res, with the resolution output at 2048x2048! Up from vanilla res of 512x512.

Only 2 versions at this stage. I may work on more versions down the track.
Included are the mesh files and normal maps for each version.

I forgot to label images to highlight which version is which.
V1 is the brushed metal one, the first before and after shot in image gallery.
Apologies.


INSTALLATION:
---------------------

Install with NMM.
To uninstall, use NMM. Simple.

CREDITS:
-------------

Bethesda for creating an awesome game
Nexus
Nexus community and modders alike

This is freeware, not to be used for commercial purposes.
If you want to use any content of this mod, no problem. But credit me. Only fair.

Questions? Comments? Constructive feedback?
Fire away.

Thanks for looking at my mod:)
author: heeresman1

files.name: Hide Shield v1-High Res brushed metal
